FuncDef: The reset control-tunnel session command restarts a control channel connection.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies a controller IP address.
The value is in dotted decimal notation.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To disconnect and reestablish a control channel connection, run the reset control-tunnel session command. This command helps verify the control channel working process. Do not use this command in other situations.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
